txt.en: Talk to Scout-master Ausma in The Pit of Stonejaws
Scout-master Ausma can be found at the encampment of Bárgstad in the Pit of Stonejaws.\n\nYou should talk to Scout-master Ausma in The Pit of Stonejaws.
'[placeholder], have you joined us to investigate the hobgoblins that dwell with the Pit of Stonejaws?'

'If you are seeking the Pit of Stonejaws, it is not far from here. You can find it by travelling north. Tread carefully, for very few dwarves have yet to venture within the deep shaft.\n\n'If you do venture into the Pit of Stonejaws, you should first seek out Scout-master Ausma. She has led a group of dwarves there just recently.'
The Pit of Stonejaws is above Máttugard, in Gundabad.
